Radius Brewing Company has spent the last two years perfecting their beer recipes while construction began at their location at sixth and Merchant streets PERIOD Finally the longanticipated grand opening will happen soon PERIOD

Although the official date of the grand opening has not yet been set Sarah Bays Radius employee said theyre expecting it to take place in a little more than a month PERIOD The opening has experienced multiple postponements due to extensive renovations being made to the building PERIOD

Emporia craft beer enthusiasts flocked to Radius Brewing Company as they held their first public beer tasting Feb PERIOD  PERIOD J PERIOD J PERIOD Bays Radius brewmaster said although Radius has not officially opened it will be holding another public beer tasting this Saturday  p.m PERIOD and Sunday  p.m PERIOD

Sarah Bays said the brewery officially employs only three people including herself and her husband J PERIOD J PERIOD

At the tasting last weekend Radius had their wheat beer pale ale India pale ale brown ale porter and stout available for sampling PERIOD They also sold refillable 32ounce squealers and 64ounce growlers of the six brews PERIOD J PERIOD J PERIOD Bays said they sold over  containers on the first day of tasting PERIOD

Thats a lot of beer sold in three hours Sarah Bays said PERIOD

Rosie Davis senior biology major said one beer that stood out to her was the porter Sarah Bayss favorite incidentally PERIOD

The Radius porter is delicious Davis said PERIOD That is a really good beer. sarah Bays said when Radius officially opens it will be a restaurant as well as a brewery complete with a woodfired brick oven for pizzas PERIOD Soups salads sandwiches and a pricier chefs menu of steak or seafood will also be available PERIOD

The menu will be pretty eclectic she said PERIOD

The delays in construction have allowed J PERIOD J PERIOD Bays to experiment with gourmet beer recipes PERIOD Sarah Bays said her husband has experimented with a lot of flavor combinations with the porter such as cocoa chipotle peanut butter and chocolate curry

There are numerous other recipes that will be available later on J PERIOD J PERIOD Bays said PERIOD Some will be variants of the beers we sold this weekend some will be very original and we will do some European styles as well. most of their ingredients come from area farmers Sarah Bays said PERIOD

We have a couple sources for local grown hops she said PERIOD When we start getting more local ingredients we will do some brews using all local ingredients. the brewing company expects to be more active in the coming months PERIOD Sarah Bays said they hope to sell growlers every weekend until the grand opening They will be attending the Kansas Craft Brewers Expo in Lawrence on March  PERIOD On April  they will also be at Emporia Main Streets Taste of Emporia at the Civic Auditorium PERIOD

With Radius poised to open after two years in the works Sarah said the company would like thank the community for their patience. log In
